005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.HashMap;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public final class MapPut {
028  private static final String NAME = "put";
029  @NonNull
030  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
031      .name(NAME)
032      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
033      .deterministic()
034      .contextIndependent()
035      .focusIndependent()
036      .argument(IArgument.builder()
037          .name("map")
038          .type(IMapItem.class)
039          .one()
040          .build())
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("key")
043          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .argument(IArgument.builder()
047          .name("value")
048          .type(IItem.class)
049          .zeroOrMore()
050          .build())
051      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
052      .returnOne()
053      .functionHandler(MapPut::execute)
054      .build();
055
056  private MapPut() {
057    // disable construction
058  }
059
060  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
061  @NonNull
062  private static <V extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
063      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
064      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
065      IItem focus) {
066    IMapItem<V> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
067    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
068    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") V value = (V) ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2)).toCollectionValue();
069
070    return put(map, key, value).asSequence();
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
075   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-put">map:put</a>.
076   *
077   * @param <V>
078   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
079   * @param map
080   *          the map of Metapath items that is to be modified
081   * @param key
082   *          the key for the value to add to the map
083   * @param value
084   *          the value to add to the map
085   * @return the modified map
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<V> put(
089      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
090      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key,
091      @NonNull V value) {
092    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap") Map<IMapKey, V> copy = new HashMap<>(map);
093    copy.put(key.asMapKey(), value);
094
095    return IMapItem.ofCollection(copy);
096  }
097}
